\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 77495}

\subsection*{Hearing Voices}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Bryan}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &  repeated &  & Diphenhydramine & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &  repeated &  & Dimenhydrinate & \\
\hline
 T+ 0:00 &  repeated &  & DXM & \\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 145.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I abused diphenhydramine and dimenhydrinate on a regular basis w/ and without DXM for about 1-1/2 to 2 years.  Ever since then I hear voices every day, the same way I hear them when I am on a dramamine trip.  I recommend to never abuse either of these substances because hearing voices every day sucks.
